title: Spawn Collection, Vol. 1
description: Witness the power of pure McFarlane with this essential collection of comics that have been out of print for 10 years The first issues of McFarlane's smash hit Spawn are here in a brand new collection - bigger and badder than ever This collection includes issues #1-8, 11, & 12, featuring the pulse-pounding art of the master himself, Todd McFarlane
author: Todd McFarlane
